summary: 执行位于2 64 6的世界中，运行函数gm4_balloon_animals:build/setup_showcase。
commands: execute in world positioned 2.54 64.00 5.93 rotated -96.00 0 positioned ^ ^ ^6 run function gm4_balloon_animals:build/setup_showcase
execute in world positioned 2.54 64.00 5.93 rotated -96.00 0 positioned ^ ^ ^6 run function gm4_balloon_animals:build/populate_showcase

steps.title: 阶段 1
steps.description: 目标：execute in world positioned 2 64 6 run function gm4_balloon_animals:build/setup_showcase

steps.title: 阶段 2
steps.description: 执行：围绕目标拆解两步执行：准备资源并落地社区验证。
